patient_info: Blurred vision,Impaired ocular abduction,Diplopia,Oculomotor apraxia,Bilateral ptosis,Dysphagia,Dyspnea,Generalized muscle weakness,Easy fatigability,EMG: decremental response of compound muscle action potential to repetitive nerve stimulation,Fatigable weakness,Upper limb muscle weakness,Weakness of muscles of respiration,Impaired mastication,Lower limb muscle weakness,Unilateral ptosis,EMG: repetitive nerve stimulation abnormality
golden_diagnosis: 全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis
predict_diagnosis:
1. Myasthenia gravis
2. Lambert-Eaton myasthenic syndrome
3. Botulism
4. Tick paralysis
5. Guillain-Barre syndrome
6. Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
7. Multiple sclerosis
8. Myasthenia gravis with anti-MuSK antibodies
9. Myasthenia gravis with anti-titin antibodies
10. Congenital myasthenic syndromes
